title: Why On-Object Editing in Power BI???
excerpt: Curious about why Power BI introduced On-object editing? Rosie Levasseur joins us to explain why! We've come to love it and hope you give it a try.  Use on-object interaction with visuals in your report (preview) https://learn.microsoft.com/power-bi/create-reports/power-bi-on-object-interaction  Roseanne
